item.description: I’m interested in various aspects of cyber-physical and wireless systems security. I hold a PhD in Computer Science from the Singapore University Design and Technology (SUTD), As part of my PhD I spent six months at the Computer Science Department of the University of Oxford (UK) as a visiting researcher advised by Kasper Rasmussen, and ten months as a visiting researcher at the Helmholtz Center for Information Security (CISPA) advised by Nils Ole Tippenhauer.
